title: The Observator's observation how narrowly he scap'd hanging A piece of London-news from Oxford, people swallow shams, bones and all. Several objections answer'd, and the slanders clear'd. Christian religion does not pretend to destroy Christian charity. The danger of dividing.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
publisher: reprinted by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham; and are to be sold by William Weston book-seller in Christ-Church-Lane,
